DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare treatment oxaliplatin/5-FU/leucovorin plus vatalanib versus oxaliplatin/5-FU/leucovorin plus placebo patient colorectal cancer spread organ whose disease worsen treatment irinotecan .
DOC.brief_title: Study Oxaliplatin/5-FU/Leucovorin Plus Vatalanib Versus Oxaliplatin/5-FU/Leucovorin Patients With Previously Treated Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Confirmed adenocarcinoma colon rectum patient metastatic disease One prior chemotherapy regimen irinotecan 5FU Evidence progressive disease within 6 month last dose irinotecan WHO Performance Status 0 , 1 , 2 Measurable tumor Adequate hematologic status , liver kidney function Life expectancy great 12 week Written inform consent obtain Exclusion criterion History presence central nervous system disease Patients history another primary cancer within 5 year Prior chemotherapy within 3 week entry study Major surgery within 4 week minor surgery within 2 week entry study Investigational drug within 4 week entry study Prior therapy oxaliplatin Peripheral neuropathy functional impairment Female patient pregnant breast feed Any severe uncontrolled medical condition could prevent participation study Chronic kidney disease Acute chronic liver disease Patients take Coumadin
